TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DispatcherFrame extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示 中的执行循环。

span.span: Represents an execution loop in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象通常分为两类: objects typically fall into two categories: - 长时间运行, 一般用途帧, 只在指示时退出。Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to. 这些帧应在请求时退出。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行, 在满足重要条件时退出的特定帧。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 当请求这些帧以等待满足其出口标准时, 这些帧可能会视为不退出。These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些帧应具有与之关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用此托管类。You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来实现与方法类似的结果[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

param.name: exitWhenRequested
param.span: 指示在要求退出所有帧时是否将退出此帧。

span.span: Indicates whether this frame will exit when all frames are requested to exit.

summary.span: 使用指定的退出请求标志初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified exit request flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常分为两类: typically fall into two categories: - 长时间运行, 一般用途帧, 仅当指示时退出。Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to. 这些帧应在请求时退出。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行, 在满足重要条件时退出的特定帧。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 当请求这些帧以等待满足其退出条件时, 这些帧可能会视为不退出。These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些帧应具有与之关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. 在应用程序关闭时, 请求所有帧退出。At application shutdown, all frames are requested to exit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个调度程序循环的顶部进行查询。 is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop. 在应用程序关闭时, 将请求退出所有帧。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用, 或不能在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来实现与方法类似的结果[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]
